name: Connor Demo
description:
A little vertical slice from the start of the game.

Planned to include a vast number of levels traveling both land,sea and air in Shooting, Driving, Platform, Onrails levels to locate your kidnapped wife. 

In a VR timed based shooter adventure.

Loads to add yet but its a start and wanted to get your feedback and together we can make Connor a great game to play. 

All the best from Moonshine Games :)

If you would like any more info please support, follow any way you can it all helps
